The RX 9070 XT has become AMD’s best-selling Radeon GPU at launch, selling 10 times more than its predecessor in its first week. Linus and Luke discuss whether this really signals a comeback for AMD, how GPU pricing has changed over time, and what it means for value-focused buyers. Plus, they dive into the Labs website’s pricing challenges and potential solutions.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nRyI3y4o9eM

title: The RX 9070 XT is breaking records

Linus and Luke respond to community questions about the “How LTT Makes Money” video, diving deeper into revenue ranges, Floatplane, merch, and why certain channels were shut down. They also discuss why full financial transparency is tricky, the complexity of tracking profitability, and how transparency can sometimes backfire.
